summary: Black Wall Street Coin: Reviving the Legacy of Black Wall Street Through Crypto - Black Wall Street coin ($BWST) aims to support and increase the number of minority businesses and entrepreneurs in the United States and globally through crypto. The project plans to provide donations to start-ups, charities, and reform initiatives, with a vision to develop a physical community in Oklahoma. Tokenomics include a total supply of 50 billion tokens, with a 5% token tax for buy/sell transactions.
